## LineCursor.next() method

Moves the cursor to the next previous connection, next connection or block in the pre order traversal. Finds the next node in the pre order traversal.

**Signature:**

```typescript
next(): IFocusableNode | null;
```
**Returns:**

[IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode_interface.md) \| null

The next node, or null if the current node is not set or there is no next value.
